    PileOfBones.playTurn(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    If three turns of the game has passed and this Pile Of Bones is still not yet defeated by other actors, then it will revive the previously dead Enemy on its current location, which is either Heavy Skeletal Swordsman ot Skeletal Bandit.
